title: Watercress and red pepper quiche
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '100 g (3½ oz) plain white flour', '75 g (2¾ oz) plain wholemeal flour', 'Salt and black pepper', '90 g (3¼ oz) 70 per cent fat spread, diced', '1 egg, beaten', 'For the filling', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '400 g (14 oz) onions, cut in half and sliced thinly lengthways', '1 tablespoon soft dark brown sugar', '2 eggs', '225 ml (8 fl oz) skimmed milk', '200 g (7 oz) watercress, tough stalks removed, leaves finely chopped', '25 g (1 oz) Parmesan cheese, grated', '1 large red pepper, diced']
